## TinySynqOptionsBase.filePath property

Path to SQLite3 database file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
filePath?: string;
```

## Remarks

If not provided, [TinySynqOptionsBase.sqlite3](./tinysynq-node.tinysynqoptionsbase.sqlite3.md) must be set.
